subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Russell Martin’s home run in the 1oth inning lifted the Yankees over the Oakland A’s after Rafael Soriano blew a 1-0 lead in ninth on a solo homer by Brandon Moss.
snippet: Russell Martin’s home run in the 1oth inning lifted the Yankees over the Oakland A’s after Rafael Soriano blew a 1-0 lead in ninth on a solo homer by Brandon Moss.
